title: The Billionaires Club
description: Tired of the same boring men? Want a man who can rock you between the sheets like no other? Then come to The Billionaires Club. The Billionaires Club is run by ten very successful men who believe that all women should be treated like the queens they are. During the daytime, you can relax by our pool or get pampered at the spa. At night time, enjoy the seductive pleasures of our men as they whisk you away into a fantasy you'll never forget. Everything at The Billionaires Club is designed to keep you happy and satisfied. We have an entirely male staff that's ready and willing to take care of all of your needs. Like the pool boy? He's very good with his pole. Need some maintenance done? We've got guys for that. Or if you prefer the finer things in life, you can stay exclusive to your billionaire. It's your time. Spend it how you see fit. You deserve it. At The Billionaires Club, you can enjoy an entire month of pampering and roof-raising sex for a charitable donation of ten thousand dollars. When you sign up, you can pick out of a list of charities that we'll designate your money to. The Billionaires Club is a non-profit organization, so you'll know that your money is going to a good cause. Do something good for your community and yourself. Come to The Billionaires Club. This is a stand-alone novel with no cliffhanger ending. Heat  Hot!
author: Sky Corgan
